properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Meeru Bahugaa Phalinchinacho Mahima Kalugunu Thandriki Ee Reethigaa Phalinchinacho Shishyulai Yundedaru (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Neeru Kattina Thotavale Neeti Vootavale Nundedaru (2) Kshaamamulo Thrupthi Nichchi Kshemamugaa Mimmu Nadipinchunu (2) Balaparachunu mee Yemukalanu (2) Adhikamugaa Phalinchudi (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Chetluleni Mettalalo Nadula Pravahimpajeyu Prabhuvu (2) Endiyunna Nelanella Neetibuggalugaa Jeyuvaadu (2) Mana Prabhuvaina Yesunandu (2) Adhikamugaa Phalinchudi (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Vadigaa Pravahinchu Nadini Boli Vistharimpajeyu Thana Shaanthini (2) Aishwaryamutho Nimpu Mimmu Mudimivaraku Mimmu Moyuvaadu (2) Mana Prabhuvaina Yesunandu (2) Adhikamugaa Phalinchudi (2){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Paadedaru Moogavaaru Ganthulu Vesedaru Kuntivaaru (2) Pogadedaru Prajalellaru Prabhuni Aascharya Kaaryamulanu (2) Mahima Ghanatha Chellinchuchu (2) Hallelooya Paadedaru (2){/lang-eng}
